channel.title: POCO F3 MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: POCO F3 MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI 21.7.7 Recovery update for Redmi K40 China
item.description:
New Weekly Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi K40 China

Codename: alioth

Version: 21.7.7 | 11.0

Size: 3.9 GB

MD5: d6d70e69ef8eed7409f0f6b1d79bf4f4

Changelog:
Bug fixes and system optimizations.

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI V12.5.1.0.RKHMIXM Fastboot update for POCO F3 Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: POCO F3 Global

Codename: alioth

Version: V12.5.1.0.RKHMIXM | 11.0

Size: 5.6 GB

MD5: 35202c0d4efca32b795a44fc5a8fcb19

Changelog:
[System]
New: With custom device model adjustments, any phone becomes faster after the upgrade.
New: Response to gestures is now instant.
New: With 20 times more rendering power, there are now few limits to what you can see on your screen.
Optimization: MIUI became lighter, faster, and more durable.
[Notes]
New: Dynamic layouts bring the typography in Notes to a new level.
New: Compose mind maps with complex structures.
New: New tools for doodling and sketching.
New: Press and hold a sketch to adjust the strokes automatically.
New: A gesture shortcut now allows you to create notes, tasks, and excerpts anywhere.
New: Excerpts save text, URLs, and images to Notes in a few simple taps.
All-new Notes.
[Xiaomi Cloud]
New: Location info can be now reported automatically before the device is powered off

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI V12.5.2.0.RKHTWXM Fastboot update for POCO F3 Taiwan
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: POCO F3 Taiwan

Codename: alioth

Version: V12.5.2.0.RKHTWXM | 11.0

Size: 4.2 GB

MD5: 4c82823626e045f93cad84024a0356f3

Changelog:
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Lock screen notification animations froze after the device was unlocked using face data
Fix: Notifications flashed in some cases
Fix: Floating notifications weren't displayed correctly in landscape mode
Fix: Notification badges weren't updated for incoming notifications on a locked device

Download: Here
